column2: "Ɔhen n'akoma wɔ EWURADZE nsamu dɛ esutsen: Ɔdan no fa mbrɛ ɔpɛ biara."
"Nyimpa no kwan tsen wɔ noara n'enyiwa do: Naaso EWURADZE na oker akoma hwɛ."
"Pɛrpɛryɛ na atsɛmbu Sɔ EWURADZE enyi sen afɔrbɔ."
"Enyi a ɔtra no ntɔn
"Mbɔdzembɔ adwen dze adze dodow nko ba: Na obiara a ɔpɛ ntsɛm no
"Akoradze a wɔdze ator tɛkyerɛma nya no
column3: Ɔyɛ ehubɔhubɔw a oridzi akɔnaaba; hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ no wɔhwehwɛ owu."

column2: "Emumuyɛfo hɔn akakabensɛm bɛpra hɔn akɔ; Osiandɛ wɔpow dza ɔtsen."
"Nyia wɔdze afɔdzi asoa no no
column3: no kwan kyeakyea koraa: Na ɔhotseweenyi dze

column2: "Ɔdan etsifi duodoo mu ne tsena ye Sen dɛ enye ɔbaa a ohwinhwin bɛtsena ɔdan kɛse mu."
"Omumuyɛfo ne kra pɛ mbusu: Na nyia ɔnye no tse fie no nnya n'enyim enyimpa."
"Sɛ wɔtsea ɔtwetwesinyi a
column3: atsetsekwaa hu nyansa: Na sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ onyansafo a

column2: "Ɔtseneneenyi gyen n'enyi hwɛ emumuyɛfo fie; Mbrɛ wobutuw emumuyɛfo kɔ hɔn sɛɛe mu."
"Nyia osisiw n'aso wɔ abɔbɔfo su ho no
"Nsumaa mu akyɛdze pata ebufuw
column3: Na akoko mu ayɛyɛdze pata ebufuhyew."

column2: "Ɔyɛ ɔtseneneenyi enyigye dɛ obobu atsɛn tsenenee; Naaso ɔyɛ ɔsɛɛ ma emumuyɛfo."
"Nyimpa a ɔwonawona fi ntseasee kwan do no
"Nyia ɔpɛ agofɛw no
column3: ɔbɛyɛ hianyi: Nyia ɔpɛ nsa na ngo no

column2: "Omumuyɛnyi yɛ asadze ma ɔtseneneenyi; Na nkontompɔtwanyi besi ɔtseneneenyi n'ananmu."
"Asaase sar do tsena ye
column3: Sen dɛ enye ɔbaa a ohwinhwin na no bo nndwe no ho bɛtsena."

column2: "Akoradze a ɔsom bo na ngo wɔ onyansafo ne tsenabea; Na ɔkwasea dze ɔmemen."
"Nyia odzi ndzeyɛtsenenee na mbɔbɔrhu ekyir no Onya nkwa
"Onyansafo fow akatakyi hɔn kurow
column3: Na ɔbrɛ no mu awerɛhyɛmu ho ahoɔdzen no adze."

column2: "Nyia osie n'ano na ne tɛkyerɛma no
column3: Osie ne kra fi ɔfona ho."

column2: "Ntsɛntsɛnnyi na ɔhopɔwnyi no
column4: Ɔyɛ edwuma wɔ ntsɛn ahopɔw mu."

column2: "Ɔkwadwefo n'akɔndɔ na oku no; Osiandɛ ne nsa pow edwumayɛ."
"Obi wɔ hɔ a n'enyi ber adze yerɛyerɛw adzekyee nyina: Na ɔtseneneenyi dze
"Omumuyɛfo n'afɔrbɔdze yɛ ekyiwadze: Na akantam dɛ ɔdze adwembɔn na ɔdze reba!"
"Ɔdasefo torfo bɛhera: Na nyia otsie no dze
"Omumuyɛfo pirim n'enyim: Na tɔɔtsenyɛnyi dze
"Nyansa anaa ntseasee Anaa apam biara nnyi hɔ tsia EWURADZE."
"Wosiesie ɔpɔnkɔ ma ɔko da: Naaso konyimdzi dze
